data: Half-way up the slope of the tall hill, beyond the park, looking far out over the city to where, in the distance, the broad blue waters of the bay sparkle and gleam in the sunshine, stands the Federal Club.
Clark, Ellery H. (Ellery Harding), 1874-1949; Cootes, F. Graham (Frank Graham), 1879-1960 [Illustrator]
